sentences.english: I must proclaim the good news of the kingdom of God to the other cities also;
sentences.chinese: 但耶稣对他们说，我也必须在别城传神国的福音。

sentences.english: The hand responds to the heart, the pettifoggery is expressive, is in the folk art essence.
sentences.chinese: 心手相应，刀笔传神，为民间艺术中的精华。

sentences.english: This leather paddle has a deliciously stinging bite, and is very expressive.
sentences.chinese: 这支皮革桨有可口地蜇的叮咬，和非常传神。

sentences.english: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督的仆人保罗，奉召为使徒，特派传神的福音。

sentences.english: Of course the Salon also featured fairly true-to-life genre and history paintings.
sentences.chinese: 自然，沙龙还精选相当传神的嬉戏类别和汗青画。

sentences.english: Screen may not be set aside may be vivid in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 画面的似与不似都可放置一旁，将传神放在首位。

sentences.english: To the immediate and vivid picture of this landscape can not be non-m point techniques.
sentences.chinese: 要传神地描绘眼前的这幅景致，非米点技法不可。

sentences.english: Paul, a servant of Christ Jesus, called to be an apostle, set apart for the gospel of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督的仆人保罗，奉召为使徒，特派传神的福音。

sentences.english: The oracles were expected to divine the future.
sentences.chinese: 传神谕者被期盼能预言未来。

sentences.english: The horse he painted is very lifelike.
On the female's chest, the ribs and the sternum have been beautifully carved.
sentences.chinese: 雌鹿的胸部部位上，肋骨民胸骨雕刻得精致传神。

sentences.english: The wonderful performance left a deep impression on us.
sentences.chinese: 精彩传神的表演一定会让您拍手叫绝。
